note:
Natural farmer by day, old-school sysadmin by night. A hermit living off-grid in the mountains. Ever curious student of science who dropped out of formal education.

Often found reading technical/agriculture books, tapping away into unix terminals or out in the fields tending to plants. This touring-complete programmer can be spotted on highways driving a small car or riding a motorcycle. Side-hustle: patron saint of yak shaving.

Just another organism in a long and unbroken chain of evolution, squinting at the night sky, gazing at the sunlit world and wondering… wtaf‽
